intro.welcome:

Feel free to contact me if you like my work.

cosmic.description: Cosmic is an Android application that relays data from a public API about celestial bodies in our solar system: stars, planets, moons, asteroids, comets, and dwarf planets. It allows users to browse, filter, and sort these objects, access detailed information, and visualize their distances from the Sun.

key_functionalities.0: Displays a list of celestial bodies with main information
key_functionalities.1: Filtering and sorting objects by various criteria
key_functionalities.2: Detailed view of a celestial body on a secondary screen
key_functionalities.3: Visualization of the distance from the Sun on a dedicated screen

learn.2: State management with MVVM and Compose
learn.5: Graphical visualization and interaction in Compose

in_life_among_us.description: In Life Among Us is a multiplayer game inspired by Among Us, but grounded in the real world. Players connect to a local Spring Boot server via an Android app. Each player is assigned a role — impostor or crewmate — and must interact with their physical environment. QR codes placed around the location act as interaction points: players scan them to perform actions, complete missions, or trigger emergency meetings. Almost all in-game actions rely on these codes, creating an immersive experience blending social gameplay with real-world movement.

key_functionalities.0: Player connection to a local Spring Boot server for game synchronization
key_functionalities.1: Automatic role assignment: impostor or crewmate
key_functionalities.2: QR code interactions: nearly every action requires scanning a code placed on-site
key_functionalities.3: Contextual actions (missions, sabotages, emergency meetings) handled through the app
key_functionalities.4: Tracking of players’ last known position based on scanned QR codes
key_functionalities.5: Secure client-server communication via Retrofit / OkHttp
key_functionalities.6: CameraX and dynamic permissions for QR code scanning

learn.0: First personal project using a Spring server
learn.1: Camera, permission, flash, and QR code handling

in_life_among_us.remarks:
⚠️This project is a non-commercial fan work made for demonstration purposes.
Currently in development.

cobria.description: Cobria is a real web platform developed by Jak Solutions to help entrepreneurs manage their work. My contribution to this large-scale project was small, but it allowed me to work on a real professional product. I mainly worked on the onboarding flow, the reward system, and responsive adjustments on several Cobria components.

key_functionalities.0: Create and manage contacts (clients, suppliers, etc.)
key_functionalities.2: Create and manage invoices linked to quotes
